description:
These started happening on 11/26 but it is flaky:

2013-11-28 15:47:41.391 21230 ERROR nova.virt.libvirt.driver [-] Nova requires libvirt version 0.9.11 or greater.
title: libvirt version error in n-cpu after successful tempest run

comments.content:
These started happening on 11/26 but it is flaky:

2013-11-28 15:47:41.391 21230 ERROR nova.virt.libvirt.driver [-] Nova requires libvirt version 0.9.11 or greater.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~david-kranz

comments.content:
There is a patch to actually increase the minimum version. https://review.openstack.org/#/c/58494/.
It may be worthwhile logging the actual version being run so that it can help us debug the issue.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~garyk

comments.content: I think that the cases that you see this are related to the patch above. Please verify.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~garyk

comments.content: Where do you see this error start happening ?  The change to increase the min required libvirt hasn't been merged yet and only one of the jenkins checks for it failed and afaik it wasn't for this reason.  Please provide a link to jenkins build logs where you see it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~berrange

comments.content:
One of these came from logs.openstack.org/94/58494/3/check/check-tempest-devstack-vm-full/2ef9650/logs/screen-n-cpu.txt.gz

But this was probably from a "check" run on a proposed commit. I have been scanning all builds to finalize the whitelist for log errors. Closing this ticket for now.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~david-kranz

comments.content:
hi , please i need a help
i think i have the same problem

i cannot create instance after installing trove.there is not a nova compute when i do nova-manage service list et get this

Binary Host Zone Status State Updated_At nova-conductor ubuntu-VirtualBox internal enabled :-) 2015-03-10 14:16:57 nova-cert ubuntu-VirtualBox internal enabled :-) 2015-03-10 14:16:56 nova-scheduler ubuntu-VirtualBox internal enabled :-) 2015-03-10 14:17:00 nova-consoleauth ubuntu-VirtualBox internal enabled :-) 2015-03-10 14:17:01

the logs say
File "/opt/stack/nova/nova/virt/libvirt/driver.py", line 546, in init_host
    self._version_to_string(MIN_LIBVIRT_VERSION))
NovaException: Nova requires libvirt version 0.9.11 or greater.
2015-03-10 13:19:42.379 ERROR nova.openstack.common.threadgroup [req-9433abde-136a-482c-bd93-1d7220150edf None None] Nova requires libvirt version 0.9.11 or greater.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bintou-16
